column5: Saturday is opening day in the Southern Sask. region. I can't wait. The water will still be pretty cold (ice has only been off a week or so). I'm wondering what type of structure, depth, etc. should one look for? Are inlet streams good locations? Also, I've heard that minnows are better than leeches in spring. What type of presentation and bait work at this time of year? Thanks in advance for your input.
